title: shankarai dayAkarI
sahitya:
shankari dayAkarI sharaNam nin caraNam ambA shiva


anupallavi

  engum nirai paripUraNi nAraNi engaLai ALa irangi vandaruL amba


caraNam    shubAkari surakula pAlini abhayapANi aruL tarum svabhAva kanikara
kapAli vasikara apAnga sundari apAra anbargaL kupA tarangiNi
